name: NIMENRIX
treatmentDescriptions: Nimenrix is indicated for active immunisation of individuals from the age of 6 weeks against invasive meningococcal diseases caused by Neisseria meningitidis group A, C, W-135 and Y.
form: powder and solvent for solution for injection
ingredients: NEISSERIA MENINGITIDIS GROUP Y POLYSACCHARIDE, NEISSERIA MENINGITIDIS GROUP W - 135 POLYSACCHARIDE, NEISSERIA MENINGITIDIS GROUP C POLYSACCHARIDE, NEISSERIA MENINGITIDIS GROUP A POLYSACCHARIDE

atc5.name: OTHER MENINGOCOCCAL MONOVALENT PURIFIED POLYSACCHARIDES ANTIGEN

warnings: תרופה מוגבלת לרישום ע'י רופא מומחה או הגבלה אחרת

packaging.name: NIMENRIX 1X0.5ML VIAL POWDER+PRE FILLED SYR SOLVENT
